user_query: I want to surprise my partner with a romantic getaway for our anniversary. Can you suggest some luxurious destinations and provide their time zones? Additionally, I would like to know the symbols and availability dates for the exchanges listed in the Tardis.dev API.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of luxurious romantic getaway destinations along with their respective time zones.
Fetch time zone information for each of the luxurious destinations identified in subtask 1.
Access the Tardis.dev API to retrieve the symbols and availability dates for the exchanges.
